name: donii-modal-walkthrough
description: A prototype for a walkthough component to explain different functionality in the Donii App

scripts.build-js: browserify  -t reactify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ]  -t envify ./src/index.js > dist/build.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify  --debug --verbose -t reactify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -t envify ./src/index.js -o dist/build.js
scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css-with-source-map && npm run build-css-with-source-map -- -w
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run compress-js && npm run compress-css
